message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for both of us, as it's well below your estimated value and still gives me a good profit. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you coming down in price, but I'm still looking to get a better deal.  I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
